IRS990.MissionDesc: TO CONDUCT, MAINTAIN, OPERATE AND MANAGE AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION AND SCHOOL, TO EDUCATE AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF GIRLS AND BOYS, YOUNG WOMEN AND YOUNG MEN AND TO STIMULATE IN THEM SOUND SCHOLARSHIP, LEARNING, PHYSICAL VIGOR AND UPRIGHTNESS OF CHARACTER BY SUCH METHODS AND UPON SUCH LIVES AS MAY SEEM EXPEDIENT.
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL THROUGH TWELFTH GRADE STUDENTS AND RELATED ACTIVITIES. THE TOTAL NUMBER OF STUDENTS WHICH ATTENDED THE SCHOOL IN FISCAL YEAR 2016 WAS 587.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL USES ITS ENDOWMENT FUNDS TO PROVIDE A PREDICTABLE STREAM OF FUNDING TO PROGRAMS SUPPORTED BY ITS ENDOWMENT FUNDS.
NET UNREALIZED LOSS ON INVESTMENTS -567195. CURRENT YEAR UNREALIZED GAIN (LOSS) ON INTEREST RATE SWAP -1472327.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: TUITION REMISSION BENEFITS TO EMPLOYEES AND STUDENT WORK PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL AID SCHOLARSHIPS PROVIDED TO STUDENTS IS BASED ON FINANCIAL AID APPLICATION COMPLETED BY FAMILY OF STUDENT, AMOUNT OF SCHOLARSHIP IS CALCULATED BASED ON INCOME, ASSETS OF FAMILY.
THE HEAD OF SCHOOL RECEIVES USE OF A PERSONAL RESIDENCE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS OF HIS EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT AGREEMENT.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: STATE OF CONNECTICUT HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: TO DESIGN AND BUILD AN ATHLETIC CENTER AND TO RETIRE A BANK LOAN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 TAX RETURN IS REVIEWED BY THE SCHOOL'S BUSINESS MANAGER AND BY THE SCHOOL'S TREASURER PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS CIRCULATED TO APPROPRIATE INDIVIDUALS ANNUALLY AND CONFLICTS DISCLOSED ARE MONITORED APPROPRIATELY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES UTILIZES DATA FROM COMPARABLE SCHOOLS IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. THE DECISIONS REGARDING COMPENSATION ARE CONTEMPORANEOUSLY DOCUMENTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S FORM 990 CAN BE FOUND ON GUIDE STAR WEBSITE, EXCLUDING SCHEDULE B.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FROM THE BUSINESS MANAGER DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS.

THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES IS RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSEEING THE ANNUAL AUDIT OF THE SCHOOL AND FOR SELECTION OF THE SCHOOL'S AUDITORS. THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
